name: open-education-api-mtt
description: OpenAPI (fka Swagger) specification for the Open Education API
author: Open Education API Working Group <info@openonderwijsapi.nl>

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build/assets/js && cp -r parameters build && cp -r paths build && cp -r schemas build && cp spec.yaml build && cp docs.html build/index.html && cp logo.png build && cp node_modules/redoc/bundles/redoc.standalone.js build/assets/js
